CustomField.description: A startrack field to store error message to be displayed when a user clicks 'Invite Contact to BSP' button while contact doesn't have any associated billing account.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A startrack field to store error message to be displayed when a user clicks 'Invite Contact to BSP' button while contact doesn't have any associated billing account.
CustomField.label: ST Contact Billing Account Validation
